__comment: These templates are used to make plants (e.g. trees, grass, shrubs) |
Growths are picked per subtype and products are assigned to each |

type.__comment: (e.g. Fungi, Grass, Moss, Plant, Tree, etc...)

TREE_NEEDLE.DESC: A #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_BASE #ADJ #NOUN with #COLORS_NEEDLE needles that grows in &1:DESC&
TREE_NEEDLE.NAME: #COLORS_NEEDLE needled #NOUN

FUNGUS_SHROOM.DESC: A #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_BASE #ADJ #NOUN with a #COLORS_CAP cap that grows in &1:DESC& <1:d>
FUNGUS_SHROOM.NAME: #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_CAP capped #ADJ #NOUN

FUNGUS_POISON.DESC: A #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_BASE #ADJ #NOUN with a #COLORS_CAP cap that grows in &1:DESC& <1:d>
FUNGUS_POISON.NAME: #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_CAP capped #ADJ #NOUN

FUNGUS_POTION.DESC: A #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_BASE #ADJ #NOUN with a #COLORS_CAP cap that grows in &1:DESC& <1:d>
FUNGUS_POTION.NAME: #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_CAP capped #ADJ #NOUN

FUNGUS_TREE.DESC: A #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_BASE #ADJ #NOUN with a #COLORS_CAP cap that grows in &1:DESC& <1:d>
FUNGUS_TREE.NAME: #SIZE #SHAPE #COLORS_CAP capped #ADJ #NOUN

season.__comment: Determines which season the plant grows in

9.d: during the spring, summer, and autumn

10.d: during the winter, spring, and summer

11.d: during the summer, autumn, and winter

12.d: during the autumn, winter, and spring
